  • All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends java.io.Serializable

        void setDestroyed(boolean bool)
        This is used to disable a Unit
        Parameters:

        the Network of this Unit

      • setNetwork

        void setNetwork(Network net)
        This is used by our algorithms to set the Energy Network
        Parameters:
        net - is the Network to set to, make sure that the Network is appropriate for the Unit's type!
